mapper.insert:
insert into base_house
sys_code, creator, is_public, is_public, gmt_create, modifier, gmt_modified, is_deleted, house_code, house_short_name, house_name, pic_res1_id, pic_res2_id, pic_res3_id, pic_res4_id, house_desc, living_id, total_area, total_floors, current_period, house_high, apply_floors, house_layout , room_layout, office_layout, way_layout, is_exist_symmetry, symmetry_ids, is_merge, merge_ids, merge_new_id, pic_res_id, is_all, house_common_code, house_type_code, house_tag, house_status, deal_status, is_review, area_code, att1, area_long_code, house_kind, att4, att5, att6, date_att1, date_att2, reset_state, num_att2, num_att3, num_att4, remark,
#{sysCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isPublic,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{houseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{houseShortName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{houseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{picRes1Id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{picRes2Id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{picRes3Id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{picRes4Id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{houseDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{livingId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{totalArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalFloors,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{currentPeriod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{houseHigh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyFloors,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{houseLayout ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roomLayout,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{officeLayout,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wayLayout,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isExistSymmetry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{symmetryIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isMerge,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mergeIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mergeNewId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{picResId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isAll,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{houseCommonCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{houseTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{houseTag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{houseStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dealStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isReview,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{att1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areaLongCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{houseKind,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{att4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{att5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{att6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dateAtt1,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dateAtt2,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{resetState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{numAtt2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{numAtt3,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{numAtt4,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.select:
SELECT l.living_name,h.area_long_code,h.living_id,COUNT(h.living_id) AS houseCount FROM base_house h JOIN base_living l ON l.id = h.living_id
and h.area_long_code like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{areaLongCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
AND l.living_name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{livingName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM house_space s WHERE s.house_id = h.id AND EXISTS (SELECT 1
FROM ( SELECT * FROM space_common limit #{levelLimitCount} ) c
FROM space_common c
WHERE c.id = s.standard_space_id AND c.is_standard_space = 1 AND c.status != 2 ) ) GROUP BY h.living_id LIMIT #{start}, #{limit}

select count(*) from (SELECT DISTINCT l.id FROM base_living as l left JOIN base_house h ON l.id = h.living_id and h.is_deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN house_space_new s on (s.house_id = h.id) LEFT JOIN space_common c on(s.standard_space_id = c.id) LEFT JOIN design_templet t ON (t.space_common_id = c.id) where 1=1 AND l.is_deleted = 0 AND h.is_deleted = 0 AND s.is_deleted = 0 AND c.is_deleted = 0 AND t.is_deleted = 0 AND t.id is not null AND c.id is not null
and c.status in
#{item}
and t.putaway_state in
#{item}
and h.area_long_code like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{areaLongCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
AND l.living_name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{livingName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%') ) u

select
from base_house where house_common_code IS NULL
select distinct b.living_id from base_house b
select bh.id from base_house bh where 1=1 and living_id = #{livingId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT CONCAT(bl.living_name,bh.house_common_code) AS unitName FROM base_house bh LEFT JOIN base_living bl ON bh.living_id = bl.id WHERE bh.id = #{houseId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND bl.id = #{livingId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select hs.space_type from (select bh.id from base_house bh where 1=1) T left join house_space_new hs on hs.house_id = T.id where T.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} group by hs.space_type having count(hs.space_type) > 0 order by hs.gmt_create
